game.name: Bob The Robber 2
game.description:
Your adventure with Bob the Robber is going to be remembered forever! Are you ready to go with him and bring some fun hours for yourself? Join Bob The Robber 2 game and be prepared to help him protect the city in the optimum possible way! Being a bandit, he knows how to spot the bad souls and stop them from doing wrong. It is not going to easy at all as you have to sneak into buildings with different floors, pick locks, avoid surveillance and look into the zombies. 

Make sure to take out guards in this one of the top adventure games for boys. Do not let the robbers steal money from the town. Enter the most appropriate locations across the city and loot them while avoiding traps and lasers! Complete the objective and try to escape fast in each level and do not forget to grab coins on your way! Use those coins to purchase new gadgets to make your mission successful! You are the only hero in this game and all other heroes are busy with other vital things. 

There are different gadgets including lock pick, energy drink, shocker, and masking spray to explore in this one of the best platform games for kids.  You can open any lock fast with the help of lock pick, energy drink makes you faster for a short time and you can deactivate a security camera through an instant photo feature. Use the shocker to stun even powerful guards from a distance and a masking spray to stay invisible in shadows! Enjoy your day without download in different challenging levels to play!
